titles.title: MP791 You Are The Mighty King

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are the mighty King,
the living Word;
Master of everything,
you are the Lord.
And I praise Your name,
and I praise Your name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are almighty God,
Saviour and Lord;
wonderful counsellor,
You are the Lord.
And I praise Your name,
and I praise Your name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are the Prince of peace,
Emmanuel;
everlasting Father,
You are the Lord.
And I love Your name,
and I love Your name.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are the Mighty King,
the living Word;
Master of everything,
You are the Lord.
